BadgeDetail.Name: Ignition I
BadgeDetail.Description: Employer: This badge demonstrates the earner understands the fundamentals of the ignition system. They can identify the firing order and miss firing engine, replace HT leads, locate the coil and remove , inspect, gap and replace a set of spark plugs.

Task.Title: Fire power
Task.Body: Upload evidence showing how to identify the firing order, miss firing engine and locating the coil.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload evidence showing how to identify the firing order, miss firing engine and locating the coil.
Task.TextileBody: Upload evidence showing how to identify the firing order, miss firing engine and locating the coil.

Task.Title: Spark up
Task.Body: Upload evidence correctly replacing a set of HT leads, remove, inspect, gap and replace a set of spark plugs.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload evidence correctly replacing a set of HT leads, remove, inspect, gap and replace a set of spark plugs.
Task.TextileBody: Upload evidence correctly replacing a set of HT leads, remove, inspect, gap and replace a set of spark plugs.
